price: 49.Nabiyow Yi naqoosah waris, diggah anu dambi cabti li xuwaw li kinniyom yol gace marah.
arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: nabbi ʿibādī annī anā al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
